name: Project Starborn
blurb: A thousand community-built sandbox games (and more!) with a fully-customizable game engine.

rewards.reward: HAPPINESS - You've just made us really happy! And of course you'll have our gratitude for everything you're able to contribute. So thank you! I'll give you a premium, long-distance high five. One of those "fist-bump-then-explode-backward" sort of epic high fives, to an imaginary you. This WILL happen, so you can always claim that I did that for you. If I ever meet you in person I'll give you another since I'll be pretty practiced at it by then. You also get access to an exclusive kickstarter-only forum when our site forums go live. This package is automatically included with every other package.

DIGITAL COPY - You'll get a digital copy of the game and a permanent multiplayer account. This will be a better rate than the final price. (Note: Look at the ADD-ON section in the left side for instructions on getting more goodies.)
BETA ACCESS - You will gain early access to the game a month before its official release. This packages includes the DIGITAL COPY reward.
FRIEND BETA - You and a friend will both get digital copies of the game (permanent multiplayer access). You will both get BETA ACCESS to the game.

GROUP BETA - You and three of your friends will get digital copies of the game (permanent multiplayer access). All four of you will get BETA ACCESS to the game. (Note: If desired, you can get the Mad Hat and Steampunk Glasses instead of gifting the game to 3 friends - this offer also extends to higher packages.)
CREDITS IN GAME - You'll get your name in the credits and our deep gratitude for being an awesome contributor :)\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the GROUP BETA reward.

GOODIES & PRIORITY ACCESS - You get the Top Hat & Crown (see left side in "add-ons"). You & your group of friends (per "GROUP BETA" reward) also receive access to private official servers that require this level of priority. You'll also get priority access to open official servers when the population limit is capped, meaning you'll be able to skip ahead and enter anyway.\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the CREDITS IN GAME reward.

GROUP LAND - You and your friends will get a special plot of land in one of our official rpg-world servers that you have complete control over. Others won't be able to build there unless your group allows it. Your plot will be large enough to build a city.\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the GOODIES & PRIORITY ACCESS rewards.

GROUP PROTOTYPE - You and your friends will have prototype access to the game, allowing you to see the game before everyone else does, even before the beta. You will have access to the game at least three weeks before the beta gets released. This gives you and your friends (or clan) the additional advantage of time to prepare your personal worlds and servers for the initial release. This package also includes the GROUP LAND rewards.

VIP CREDIT - You'll be listed as a VIP in the credits of our game. You'll get a special color associated with your account, which identifies you as a VIP on our website, forums, and official servers. Other mysterious benefits may be given as well, as well as some of our stretch goals.\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the GROUP PROTOTYPE rewards.
GROUP EXPANSION - The GROUP LAND reward that you received now has a city limit that is more than doubled in size.\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the VIP CREDIT rewards.
VIP CLAN - You and your friends now own a clan that is granted a VIP status within Starborn, which will be included on forums and official servers. This package comes with the GROUP EXPANSION reward.

GAMEMASTERS - Your VIP clan will now be given control of an official server (the highest positioned servers in the master list) for 72 hours. This will give your clan huge amounts of exposure for recruitment, as well as ample time to show everyone what your clan is all about. This package comes with the VIP CLAN rewards.

CUSTOM MAP - We will build your VIP clan a custom map (such as a port city, sprawling dungeon, magical lair, etc) based on your idea, sketch, or suggestions. You can choose the style and feel of the map as well. It will become an official map of Project Starborn that everyone can use with name, credit, and prestige provided to you and your VIP clan.\r\n\r\nThis package comes with the GAMEMASTERS rewards.

ASSOCIATE PRODUCER - You will be listed as an associate producer in our credits. This comes with a unique color to identify you on our website, forums, and official servers. You and your clan will be given your own official server to run and control for five months. You will be given the opportunity to join us in a developer's meeting or two with our team where you'll discuss the current and future plans of Project Starborn with us, as well as your ideas and suggestions. (This will be done via telecommuting, unless you happen to live near me).\r\n\r\nThis package also includes the CUSTOM MAP rewards.
